content.value:
Linus trashes miners and GPU manufacturers for months over everything going on and then some fucking Crypto company sponsors a video and they go along with it?

Spineless.

Lost a lot of respect for LTT today.
content.html: Linus trashes miners and GPU manufacturers for months over everything going on and then some fucking Crypto company sponsors a video and they go along with it? Spineless. Lost a lot of respect for LTT today.
